navegacao.question: What class do we use to declare a variable to store text?
If you want to store a value for use in multiple methods in the same class, what are possible options?
navegacao.answer0: Declare and use a property in that class
navegacao.answer1: Declare and use an instance variable
navegacao.answer2: Both answers above can be used

navegacao.question: What does the keyword, IBOutlet, mean?
navegacao.answer0: Denotes a property that connects to an element in your storyboard
navegacao.answer1: Denotes a method that can be connected to an event of a UIElement in the storyboard
navegacao.answer2: Denotes a variable that references an element in your storyboard
